summary: Analyzed Beauty Booking module for bugs using code review and analysis. Found 10 bugs: 2 critical (pagination offset bug, syntax error), 3 high priority (wallet transaction type, nested transactions, missing validation), 3 medium priority (race conditions, null checks, error handling), and 2 low priority (code duplication, magic numbers). Fixed 2 critical bugs: pagination offset in Customer Booking Controller and syntax error in BeautyCalendarService. Created comprehensive bug report in BEAUTY_MODULE_BUGS_FOUND.md.
current_status: Beauty Booking module bug analysis complete. Found 10 bugs total. Fixed 2 critical bugs (pagination offset and syntax error). Remaining 8 bugs documented with priorities and recommendations. Bug report created at BEAUTY_MODULE_BUGS_FOUND.md. Ready for review and additional fixes.
